channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.description:

item.title: Report E-2024030401
item.description:
Report E-2024030401

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-22T18:13:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-22
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO contacted the call center to report a spill that was discovered on the dock in Sparks, NV. The spill consists of 6-750 mL metal cans of V7206 Printing Ink, which arrived at the terminal crushed and leaking inside the box and the containers. No surfaces were impacted.
